name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  Legend says that when the first usurper came to the primordial sea, the firstsovereign gave him a goblet of water.  Later, he became the unquestioned god-king, and used this goblet of water torefine the mysterious drops of dew, establishing a splendid and powerfulempire.  But that is now an ancient story, whose main characters now sleep in thephosphorescence of the schools of the deepwater fish.
